title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
created_time: March 31, 2023, 02:20:02 AMLast edit: March 31, 2023, 03:11:51 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: Brass rounds are in production, copper bars are almost ready and silver fractions next month.  Enjoy the pictures!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Looks fun.. I like the brass coins with the swordsBased on your theme, should load them with some Pirate Chain..lol    https://pirate.black/

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.created_time: March 31, 2023, 02:33:08 AMLast edit: March 31, 2023, 03:43:48 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Thanks!! Having a blast over here!  I think I have a custom bar somewhere with some on it  . If I can locate it, I'll post pics. I get request to make a lot of different alt pieces because there isn't really a market for physical alt suppliers. My custom alts are usually hand stamped into 999 silver bars.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: what will be the cost of the coin and the bar?

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Brass -are mass produced for trade. Price isn't in stone yet, but i'm aiming for 10 for $250 in a coin pouch. Singles would be $35 ea.All will be funded. The first 100 are hand stamped 1-100 PR . The rest will only be stamped with the location they are being purchased from. If you live in Missouri, for example , they will be hand stamped "MO".Copper Bars - will be $135 fully funded + shipping $10.20 = equivalent in Bitcoin price. If a few people want some for "DIY" i can get you them at a better price, but you have to buy a full tube of 20. Only 3 tubes available for DIYSilver - I won't have numbers for a few more weeks. Aiming for under $30 funded.

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on April 03, 2023, 09:43:54 PMNice work! Thanks a lot. Just getting warmed up  Think NORFED mixed with Casascius/ Titan  minus the whole 2fa stuff haha. I want the QR codes to have everything needed. instructions, COA and verification link. If i die, no one will need me or a website to remain up to gain access to their funds. The way it should be.
